aka: New Queer Visions: Direkt Neben Dir

cast.name: 卡利姆·卡马拉 Karim Camara
弗洛尔·博纳文图拉 Flore Bonaventura

director.name: 弗朗索瓦·巴比耶 François Barbier

this_title: New Queer Visions: Right Beside You
trans_title: 酷儿新视野：就在你身边
New Queer Visions: Direkt Neben Dir
introduction: In times of strife it's important to have someone by your side. Whether it is a shoulder to cry on or a source of confidence, a best friend or a distant lover, these six tales from Mexico, Brazil, France the UK and the Netherlands prove that the search for companionship is a journey worth taking.
chinese_title: 酷儿新视野：就在你身边
foreign_title: New Queer Visions: Right Beside You
